summary: The speaker explains that the breath connects the conscious and subconscious mind. She elaborates on the function of the frontal lobe, where conscious cognitive choices are made, and how conscious breathing can activate this area. She shares a scientific study about meditation, where 20 minutes of daily meditation over eight weeks resulted in a shrinkage of the amygdala and growth of brain cells in the frontal lobe.
